title: Comic Collector Pro 16.3.7 + Patch [4realtorrentz]
description:
Collectorz.com Comic Collector â€“ Comic Book Database Software. Catalog your comic book collection in no time at all. Just enter titles or scan barcodes for automatic issue data & cover art.

Features:

- Catalog your comic book collection automatically
- Automatically download full issue data, like creator and character lists, sollicitations, plus cover art.
- Just enter the series titles or scan comic book barcodes.
- Browse, sort and search your comic book collection
- Browse your comic database in cover flow. Sort lists any way you want. Find issues quickly and easily.
- Keep track of your collection and wish list. Never buy dupes again.
- Export your data to the mobile app, share it online
- Export your comic database and wish list to the CLZ Comics app, available for iPhone/iPad & Android.
- Upload your database online, for easy access & sharing with friends.
- Browse your comic book database
- Use Comic Collectorâ€™s main screen to browse, sort and search your comic database. Choose from multiple views and layouts.
- Easily add new comic books to your database, by Title or by Barcode
- Adding new comic to your personal comic database database is quick and easy, just search our central online comic database Series Title and select the issues you own.

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Copy patch to installation directory
3. Run as administrator
4. Done
